event.title: founded the village of Lodi in 1846

data.event: Isaac Palmer founded the village of Lodi in 1846 in what was then the Pleasant Valley Precinct of the Wisconsin Territory.
Spring Creek powered a sawmill that year and a grist mill followed in 1850.
Spring Creek powered a sawmill that year and a grist mill followed in 1850.

event.title: do not freeze over the winter

data.event: Portions of the creek do not freeze over the winter and thus serve as host to brown trout and waterfowl, particularly mallards.
